attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am 53, work shifts pay lot's of tax, no trains, buses, have I to walk to work, would the pm walk 16 miles to work, have I to stop work?? what does he suggest, I work in scotland prestwick, own a car and caravan for my holidays in brittan, ha ha, can't afford the fuel now. w watson

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
